list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a violent disturbance of the atmosphere with strong winds and usually rain, thunder, lightning, or snow.
a tumultuous reaction; an uproar or controversy.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the book caused a storm in South America
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cuốn sách gây ra một cơn bão ở Nam Mỹ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a direct assault by troops on a fortified place.
move angrily or forcefully in a specified direction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she burst into tears and stormed off
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô bật khóc và xông vào

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of troops) suddenly attack and capture (a building or other place) by means of force.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: commandos stormed a hijacked plane early today
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Commandos đã xông vào một chiếc máy bay bị tấn công vào đầu ngày hôm nay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of the weather) be violent, with strong winds and usually rain, thunder, lightning, or snow.
